description.english: This land has become your home

description.italian: Questa terra è diventata la tua casa
description.spanish: Esta tierra se ha convertido en tu casa
description.japanese: この地が君の故郷となった
description.brazilian: Esta terra se tornou seu lar

description.english: Predator has become prey

description.french: Le prédateur est devenu proie
description.italian: Il predatore è diventato preda
description.spanish: El depredador se ha convertido en presa
description.japanese: 捕食者が餌食になった
description.brazilian: Predador se tornou presa

description.english: Embraced by a new tribe
description.german: Von einem neuen Stamm aufgenommen
description.french: Adopté par une nouvelle tribu
description.italian: Accolto da una nuova tribù
description.spanish: Adoptado por una nueva tribu
description.japanese: 新たな部族から受け入れられている
description.brazilian: Acolhido por uma nova tribo

description.english: Your travels have taken you far
description.german: Deine Reisen haben dich weit gebracht
description.french: Tes voyages t'ont mené loin
description.italian: I tuoi viaggi ti hanno portato lontano
description.spanish: Tus viajes te han llevado lejos
description.japanese: はるか遠くまで辿り着いた
description.brazilian: Suas viagens o levaram para longe

description.english: History lessons
description.german: Geschichtsunterricht
description.french: Leçons d'histoire
description.italian: Leziona di storia
description.spanish: Lecciones históricas
description.japanese: 歴史の授業
description.brazilian: Lições de História

description.english: One need not travel alone
description.german: Man muss nicht alleine reisen
description.french: Personne n'a à voyager seul
description.italian: Non devi per forza viaggiare da solo
description.spanish: Uno no debe viajar solo
description.japanese: 一人で旅する必要はない
description.brazilian: Não é preciso viajar sozinho

description.english: You encountered the echo of Nineteen Spades, Endless Reflections
description.german: Du bist dem Echo von Neunzehn Spaten, Unzählige Reflexionen begegnet
description.french: Tu as rencontré l'écho de Dix-neuf bêches, reflets infinis
description.italian: Ti sei imbattuto nell'eco di Diciannove pale, infiniti riflessi
description.koreana: 열아홉 자루의 삽, 끝없는 반영의 메아리와 조우했다
description.spanish: Has encontrado el eco de diecinueve picas, reflejos infinitos
description.schinese: 你遇到了“十九铁铲，无尽倒影”的残余回响
description.russian: Тебе повстречался отголосок Девятнадцати Пик, Бесконечных Отражений.
description.japanese: 鋤19個、果てしなき反射の残響と遭遇した
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o eco de Dezenove Espadas, Reflexos Infinitos

displayName.french: Des gouttelettes sur cinq grosses gouttelettes
displayName.koreana: 다섯 알의 큰 물방울 위의 물방울

description.english: You encountered the echo of Droplets upon Five Large Droplets
description.german: Du bist dem Echo von Tröpfchen über Fünf Großen Tröpfchen begegnet
description.french: Tu as rencontré l'écho de Des gouttelettes sur cinq grosses gouttelettes
description.italian: Ti sei imbattuto nell'eco di Gioccioline su cinque gocciolone
description.koreana: 다섯 알의 큰 물방울 위의 물방울의 메아리와 조우했다
description.spanish: Has encontrado el eco de gotitas en cinco grandes gotitas
description.schinese: 你遇到了“五大水滴，先之而落”的残余回响
description.russian: Тебе повстречался отголосок Капель На Пяти Больших Каплях.
description.japanese: 大きな滴5滴の上の滴の残響と遭遇した
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o eco de Gotas sobre Cinco Grandes Gotas

displayName.spanish: Una campana, dieciocho cuentas de ámbar
displayName.brazilian: Um Sino, Dezoito Continhas de Âmbar

description.english: You encountered the echo of A Bell, Eighteen Amber Beads
description.german: Du bist dem Echo von Eine Glocke, Achtzehn Bernsteinperlen begegnet
description.french: Tu as rencontré l'écho de Une cloche, dix-huit perles ambrées
description.italian: Ti sei imbattuto nell'eco di Una campana, diciotto perle d'ambra
description.koreana: 하나의 종, 열여덟 호박구슬의 메아리와 조우했다
description.spanish: Has encontrado el eco de una campana, dieciocho cuentas de ámbar
description.schinese: 你遇到了“一颗铃铛，十八琥珀”的残余回响
description.russian: Тебе повстречался отголосок Колокола, Восемнадцати Янтарных Бусин.
description.japanese: ベル1つ、琥珀玉18個の残響と遭遇した
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o eco de Um Sino, Dezoito Continhas de Âmbar

displayName.french: Quatre aiguilles sous une abondance de feuilles
displayName.italian: Quattro aghi sotto un mucchio di foglie
displayName.japanese: 生い茂る葉の下の4本の針

description.english: You encountered the echo of Four Needles under Plentiful Leaves
description.german: Du bist dem Echo von Vier Nadeln unter Vielen Blättern begegnet
description.french: Tu as rencontré l'écho de Quatre aiguilles sous une abondance de feuilles
description.italian: Ti sei imbattuto nell'eco di Quattro aghi sotto un mucchio di foglie
description.koreana: 무성한 이파리 아래 네 바늘의 메아리와 조우했다
description.spanish: Has encontrado el eco de cuatro agujas bajo abundantes hojas
description.schinese: 你遇到了“四针之上，枝繁叶茂”的残余回响
description.russian: Тебе повстречался отголосок Четырёх Игл Под Обильной Листвой.
description.japanese: 生い茂る葉の下の4本の針の残響と遭遇した
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o eco de Quatro Agulhas sob Folhas Abundantes

displayName.english: Six Grains of Gravel, Mountains Abound
displayName.german: Sechs Körner Kies, eine Menge Berge
displayName.french: Six grains de gravillons, les montagnes abondent
displayName.italian: Sei granelli di ghiaia, abbondano montagne
displayName.spanish: Seis granos de gravilla, abundan montañas
displayName.brazilian: Seis Grãos de Cascalho, Abundância de Montanhas

description.english: You encountered the echo of Six Grains of Gravel, Mountains Abound
description.german: Du bist dem Echo von Sechs Körner Kies, eine Menge Berge begegnet
description.french: Tu as rencontré l'écho de Six grains de gravillons, les montagnes abondent
description.italian: Ti sei imbattuto nell'eco di Sei granelli di ghiaia, abbondano montagne
description.koreana: 여섯 알의 자갈, 사방의 산의 메아리와 조우했다
description.spanish: Has encontrado el eco de seis granos de gravilla, abundan montañas
description.schinese: 你遇到了“六颗砂砾，群峰林立”的残余回响
description.russian: Тебе повстречался отголосок Шести Зёрен Гравия, Множества Гор.
description.japanese: 砂利6粒、たくさんの山々の残響と遭遇した
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o eco de Seis Grãos de Cascalho, Abundância de Montanhas

description.english: You encountered the echo of Two Sprouts, Twelve Brackets
description.german: Du bist dem Echo von Zwei Sprossen, Zwölf Träger begegnet
description.french: Tu as rencontré l'écho de Deux germes, douze équerres
description.italian: Ti sei imbattuto nell'eco di Due germogli, dodici parentesi
description.koreana: 두 새싹, 열두 지지대의 메아리와 조우했다
description.spanish: Has encontrado el eco de dos brotes, doce horquillas
description.schinese: 你遇到了“两株新芽，十二支架”的残余回响
description.russian: Тебе повстречался отголосок Двух Ростков, Двенадцати Скобок.
description.japanese: 芽2つ、ブラケット12個の残響と遭遇した
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o eco de Dois Brotos, Doze Hastes

description.english: The highest enlightenment, achieved by the hardest path. A feat even the guardians must respect.
description.german: Die höchste Erleuchtung, erreicht durch den schwersten Weg. Eine Meisterleistung, die sogar die Wächter anerkennen müssen.
description.french: La plus grande illumination atteinte par le chemin le plus dur. Un exploit que même les gardiens doivent respecter.
description.italian: L'illuminazione massima, raggiunta tramite il percorso più duro. Un'impresa che ispira rispetto persino nei guardiani.
description.koreana: 가장 고된 길을 통해 제일 높은 경지의 계몽을 달성했다. 가디언들마저 경의를 표해야 할 위업이다.
description.spanish: La iluminación suprema, conseguida por el sendero más duro. Una proeza que hasta los guardianes deben respetar.
description.schinese: 历经艰难所得，此业金石为开
description.russian: Высшее просветление, достигнутое самым трудным из путей. Подвиг, ценимый даже стражами.
description.japanese: 最も過酷な道で達成できた者だけが得られる悟りの境地。ガーディアンさえも尊重すべき偉業だ。
description.brazilian: A mais elevada iluminação, alcançada por meio do caminho mais árduo. Um feito que até mesmo os guardiões devem respeitar.

description.english: A significant gain, but at what cost?
description.german: Ein bedeutender Gewinn, aber zu welchem Preis?
description.french: Un gain significatif, mais à quel prix ?
description.italian: Una vittoria significativa, ma a quale costo?
description.koreana: 상당한 이득을 얻었다. 하지만 그 대가는?
description.spanish: Una ganancia significativa, ¿pero a qué precio?
description.schinese: 所获丰盛可口，罔顾代价为何
description.japanese: 膨大な収穫となるが、犠牲になるものは？
description.brazilian: Um ganho considerável, mas a que custo?

description.english: You are not the only lost soul in this world..
description.german: Du bist nicht die einzige Seele auf dieser Welt.
description.french: Tu n'es pas la seule âme en peine dans ce monde.
description.italian: Non sei l'unica anima persa in questo mondo...
description.koreana: 이 세상에서 길 잃은 영혼은 당신만이 아니다.
description.spanish: No eres la única alma perdida de este mundo...
description.russian: Ты не единственная потерянная душа в этом мире...
description.japanese: この世界で孤立しているのは、お前だけではない。
description.brazilian: Você não é a única alma perdida neste mundo...

description.english: “Go west, past the Farm Arrays and then down deep into the earth...”
description.german: „Gehe nach Westen, an den Farmen vorbei und in den Boden hinein ...“
description.french: « Va vers l'Ouest, après la Pléiade des Fermes, puis loin dans la terre... »
description.italian: "Dirigiti verso ovest oltre la serie di fattorie e quindi scendi nella terra..."
description.koreana: "서쪽으로 가, 농장 배열지를 지나 땅 깊숙이 내려가..."
description.spanish: "Ve hacia el oeste, pasa las matrices de granjas y baja hasta el fondo de la tierra..."
description.schinese: “向西走，穿过农场阵列。然后深入地下……”
description.russian: «Иди на запад через Массивы ферм и спустись в разлом...»
description.japanese: 「農場アレイの道を西へずっと進み、陸地に亀裂が入っているところをできる限り深く地球の下へと降りて行け...」
description.brazilian: "Vá para o oeste, para além dos Conjuntos Agrários, e então desça profundamente terra adentro..."

description.english: You have left this world behind
description.german: Du hast diese Welt hinter dir gelassen
description.french: Tu as laissé ce monde derrière toi
description.italian: Ti sei lasciato questo mondo alle spalle
description.spanish: Has dejado atrás este mundo
description.japanese: 君はこの世界から旅立った
description.brazilian: Você deixou este mundo para trás

description.english: A final charitable act
description.german: Ein letzter wohltätiger Akt.
description.french: Une dernière action charitable
description.italian: Un ultimo atto caritatevole
description.spanish: Un acto de caridad final
description.japanese: 最後の慈善活動
description.brazilian: Um último ato beneficente

description.english: You have found another way out
description.german: Du hast einen anderen Ausweg gefunden.
description.french: Tu as trouvé une autre sortie
description.italian: Hai trovato un'altra via di uscita
description.spanish: Has encontrado otra salida
description.japanese: あなたは別の手段を見つけました
description.brazilian: Você encontrou outra forma de sair

description.english: You return from scouting a new land
description.german: Du kehrst von der Erkundung eines neuen Gebietes zurück.
description.french: Tu rentres après avoir exploré une nouvelle terre
description.italian: Ritorni dall'esplorazione di una nuova terra
description.spanish: Has vuelto tras explorar un territorio nuevo
description.japanese: 新しい土地の調査から帰ってきました
description.brazilian: Você voltou após fazer o reconhecimento de um novo terreno

description.english: The consequences of your journey have caught up with you
description.german: Die Folgen deiner Reise haben dich eingeholt.
description.french: Tu subis les conséquences de ton voyage
description.italian: Subisci le conseguenze del tuo viaggio
description.spanish: Llegan las consecuencias de tu viaje
description.japanese: 旅の結末は、あなたに追いつきました
description.brazilian: Você está pagando o preço da sua jornada

description.english: Fates have been flipped
description.german: Die Schicksale haben sich gewendet.
description.french: Les destins ont été inversés
description.italian: Il destino è mutato
description.spanish: El destino ha cambiado
description.japanese: 運命は一転しました
description.brazilian: Os destinos foram invertidos

description.english: You have delivered your most important message
description.german: Du hast deine wichtigste Botschaft übermittelt.
description.french: Tu as livré le message le plus important de ta vie
description.italian: Hai consegnato un messaggio importantissimo
description.spanish: Has entregado el mensaje más importante
description.japanese: 最も重要なメッセージを届けました
description.brazilian: Você entregou sua mensagem mais importante

description.english: Everything comes full circle
description.german: Der Kreis schließt sich.
description.french: La boucle est bouclée
description.italian: Tutto ritorna
description.koreana: 모든 것이 완전히 한 바퀴를 돌았다
description.spanish: Se cierra el círculo
description.japanese: すべては一巡します
description.brazilian: Tudo tem um fim

description.english: You completed every challenge laid before you
description.german: Du hast jede Herausforderung gemeistert, die vor dir lag.
description.french: Tu as relevé tous les défis proposés.
description.italian: Hai completato tutte le sfide.
description.koreana: 당신 앞에 있는 모든 도전을 완료했다
description.spanish: Has completado todos los desafíos en tu camino.
description.japanese: 目の前にあるチャレンジをすべてクリアしました。
description.brazilian: Você concluiu todos os desafios que lhe foram apresentados.

description.english: You completed every expedition laid before you
description.german: Du hast jede Expedition gemeistert, die vor dir lag.
description.french: Tu as effectué toutes les expéditions proposées.
description.italian: Hai completato tutte le spedizioni.
description.koreana: 당신 앞에 있는 모든 원정을 완료했다
description.spanish: Has completado todas las expediciones en tu camino.
description.japanese: 目の前にある遠征をすべてクリアしました。
description.brazilian: Você concluiu todas as expedições que lhe foram apresentadas.

description.english: Path of self-sacrifice
description.german: Du gehst den Weg der Selbstaufopferung.
description.french: Le chemin du sacrifice
description.italian: Percorso di abnegazione
description.spanish: Sendero del sacrificio
description.japanese: 自己犠牲への道
description.brazilian: Caminho do autossacrifício

description.english: Great strides have been made
description.german: Es wurden große Fortschritte gemacht.
description.french: C'est un petit pas pour le chat-limace
description.italian: Sono stati compiuti grandi passi
description.spanish: Has dado pasos de gigante
description.japanese: 大きく前進しました
description.brazilian: Grandes avanços foram feitos

description.english: Listened to the conflation of echoes
description.german: Du hast der Verschmelzung der Echos gelauscht.
description.french: Tu as écouté la confusion des échos
description.italian: Hai ascoltato la fusione degli echi
description.spanish: Has escuchado al cúmulo de los ecos
description.japanese: 混じり合う残響に耳を傾けました
description.brazilian: Ouviu a conflação dos ecos

description.english: Followed your parental instincts
description.german: Du bist deinen elterlichen Instinkten gefolgt.
description.french: Tu as suivi ton instinct maternel
description.italian: Hai seguito i tuoi istinti materni
description.spanish: Has seguido tu instinto maternal
description.japanese: 親の本能に従いました
description.brazilian: Seguiu seus instintos maternais
